articles.content: When it arrived in the late ’90s, GTA broke all the rules. It was a true, open-world pioneer in which players could live by their own code, or throw any such principles to the wind if they wished. It… [+4929 chars]

articles.author: Anna Macdonald
articles.title: Big floating bubbles highlight Daikin’s ‘pockets of air’ via BWM Isobar - MuMbrella
